hero.title: Streamline Team Workflows with Precise Access Controls
hero.description: Control your team's digital workflow by customizing access to both shared and private workspaces with MuseDAM's Permissions feature, designed to streamline collaboration and maintain focus.
showcase.title: Drive Team Performance through MuseDAM's Permissions
showcase.points.0.description: Divide your team's digital space into shared and private areas to accommodate both collaborative and individual work.
showcase.points.1.description: Private space administrators have the autonomy to activate or deactivate these areas, providing a secure environment for sensitive projects.
showcase.points.2.description: Customize folder access in your team's shared space to meet the specific needs of members and departments with granular permissions: Edit, Upload, View, and Download.
text-display.title: MuseDAM Permissions: The Foundation of Team Efficiency and Security
text-display.points.0.description: Ensure data integrity and team access with precise permission settings.
text-display.points.1.description: Safeguard sensitive data with flexible private space management.
text-display.points.2.description: Nurture collaboration through controlled permissions that drive teamwork.
text-display.points.3.description: Boost productivity by streamlining resource access for team members.
text-display.points.4.description: Don't let inflexible permissions hinder your team's potential. With MuseDAM Permissions, create a tailored access control system that boosts efficiency and security.
